text: Gisostola melancholica is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Thomson in 1857. It is known from Brazil.BioLib.cz - Gisostola melancholica. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Forsteriini Category:Beetles described in 1857
title: Gisostola melancholica
